entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
